item.title: Jan 17 2025 – Duduk, Jazz & Winter Nights – Ethnosonic & Sar Kamlér – Live in Concert
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Dudukhouse Presents: “Duduk, Jazz & Winter Nights” Warm up to a fusion of the duduk’s soul, jazz, and global sounds. Event info: https://www.dudukhousemusic.com/ Date: Friday,...
item.content:encoded:
Dudukhouse Presents:
“Duduk, Jazz & Winter Nights”
Warm up to a fusion of the duduk’s soul, jazz, and global sounds.
Event info: https://www.dudukhousemusic.com/

Date: Friday, January 17, 2025
Time: 7:30 PM – 9:30 PM (Doors open at 7:00 PM)
Venue: City Playhouse Theatre
102-1000 New Westminster Drive, Vaughan, ON L4J 8G3

item.title: 2013, Ballet “Hymn to the Sun”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: In 2013, Aslan Gotov creates the ballet “Hymn to the Sun” for the Opera and Ballet Theater of the Kabardino-Balkarian Republic. Russia, Nalchik.
item.content:encoded: In 2013, Aslan Gotov creates the ballet “Hymn to the Sun” for the Opera and Ballet Theater of the Kabardino-Balkarian Republic. Russia, Nalchik.

item.title: Autumn 2007, Russian State Music Center
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Autumn 2007, the Russian State Music Center released an album of popular music performed by the Yuri Silantiev Academic Grand Concert Orchestra, which includes several...
item.content:encoded: Autumn 2007, the Russian State Music Center released an album of popular music performed by the Yuri Silantiev Academic Grand Concert Orchestra, which includes several pieces arranged by Aslan Gotov
